name: .DDC File Extension
summary: Learn about .DDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Fichier descriptor file that contains descriptions of DivX-formatted DVD movies; includes information such as the movie's plot summary, duration, director, actors, movie poster, etc.

content: Descriptor files created by DivX Descriptor 2 use the .DDCX extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
